name: @tpmjs/tools-discord
description: Discord API tools for AI agents. Send messages, manage guilds, channels, threads, members, reactions, and more.

tools.name: sendMessage
tools.description: Send a message to a Discord channel.

tools.name: listGuilds
tools.description: List guilds (servers) the bot is a member of.

tools.name: getGuild
tools.description: Get detailed information about a Discord guild.

tools.name: listChannels
tools.description: List all channels in a Discord guild.

tools.name: getChannel
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Discord channel.

tools.name: listMessages
tools.description: Retrieve recent messages from a Discord channel.

tools.name: createChannel
tools.description: Create a new text or voice channel in a Discord guild.

tools.name: editMessage
tools.description: Edit a previously sent message in a Discord channel.

tools.name: deleteMessage
tools.description: Delete a message from a Discord channel.

tools.name: addReaction
tools.description: Add an emoji reaction to a Discord message.

tools.name: listMembers
tools.description: List members of a Discord guild with pagination.

tools.name: getMember
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific guild member.

tools.name: createThread
tools.description: Create a new thread from a message in a Discord channel.

tools.name: listThreads
tools.description: List active threads in a Discord channel.

tools.name: pinMessage
tools.description: Pin a message in a Discord channel.
